document_data.name: Seeing Justice
document_data.mainbody: '''Seeing Justice''' was one of the several monthly high rituals of the [[Church of Tyr]].
document_data.Description: The ritual was performed on the first day of every month.
document_data.Activities: During the ceremony, the worshipers would chant prayers and loudly sing hymns, which summoned the [[illusion]] of a gigantic searing-white [[war hammer]] hovering over their heads, radiating heat.
